subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk may not be a Devil past this spring. But unless Coach Jacques Lemaire locks him in a defensive straitjacket, he should give the Devils a new offensive dimension.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk may not be a Devil past this spring. But unless Coach Jacques Lemaire locks him in a defensive straitjacket, he should give the Devils a new offensive dimension.
